index.has-documents: You have submitted the following documents for the Canadian Dental Care Plan:
index.no-documents: You have not submitted any documents for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.

upload.max-files_one: You can upload one file at once.
upload.max-files_other: You can upload up to {{count}} files at once.
upload.max-size: Maximum file size is {{filesize}}. File types accepted: {{extensions}}

error-message.applicant-required: Select a person from the drop down list.
error-message.document-type-required: Select a document type for file “{{filename}}”.
error-message.invalid-file-type: File “{{filename}}” is not supported. You can upload a file in one of the following formats: {{extensions}}
error-message.too-many-files-maximum_one: but a maximum of one file can be uploaded at a time.
error-message.too-many-files-maximum_other: but a maximum of {{count}} files can be uploaded at a time.
error-message.file-too-large: File “{{filename}}” is too large. Make sure the file size is less than {{filesize}}.
error-message.scan-incomplete: File(s) scan could not be completed.

not-required.description: You do not need to upload any documents at this time.
